problem_text: Find the perimeter of the \triangle D E F, if \triangle D E F \sim \triangle C B F, perimeter of \triangle C B F = 27, D F = 6, F C = 8.
compact_text: Find the perimeter of the \triangle DEF, if \triangle DEF \sim \triangle CBF, perimeter of \triangle CBF = 27, DF = 6, FC = 8.
annotat_text: Find the perimeter of the $\triangle DEF$, if $\triangle DEF \sim \triangle CBF$, perimeter of $\triangle CBF=27, DF=6, FC=8$.
